name: Which Facebook ads or pages do you want to scrape?
description: Add a URL of a Facebook Page or Facebook Ad. You can add multiple URLs.

name: Results amount
description: If this limit is not set only initial page of results returned

name: I want only the total count of ads per page
description:
If this feature is used, only total count of ads will be saved per page scroll.
The output will be saved as a single dataset item per page.
